name: part_010
file: tmp_歌って笑って？！ミオサマーパーティ ～今年の誕生日はケーキ食べれるのか？！～ [8CKhYDlwrZg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Ookami Mio performs a cover of 'secret base ～君がくれたもの～' at a virtual summer festival setting.

subtitles.original:
secret base ～君がくれたもの～
作詞・作曲 町田紀彦
subtitles.english:
secret base ~Kimi ga Kureta Mono~
Lyrics & Composition: Norihiko Machida

subtitles.original: 君と夏の終わり 将来の夢 大きな希望 忘れない
subtitles.english:
The end of summer with you, dreams of the future,
great hopes—I won't forget them.

subtitles.original: 10年後の8月 また出会えるのを信じて
subtitles.english:
Believing that we'll meet again in August,
ten years from now.

subtitles.original: 最高の
subtitles.english: The best

subtitles.original: 思い出を...
subtitles.english: memories...

subtitles.original: 出会いはふっとした瞬間 帰り道の交差点で
subtitles.english:
Our meeting was a sudden moment,
at the intersection on the way home.

subtitles.original: 声をかけてくれたね 「一緒に帰ろう」
subtitles.english: You called out to me, "Let's go home together."

subtitles.original: 僕は照れくさそうに カバンで顔を隠しながら
subtitles.english: Embarrassed, I hid my face with my bag.

subtitles.original: 本当はとてもとても 嬉しかったよ
subtitles.english: But in truth, I was so, so happy.

subtitles.original: ああ 花火が夜空 きれいに咲いて ちょっとセツナク
subtitles.english:
Ah, the fireworks bloomed beautifully in the night sky,
feeling a bit bittersweet.

subtitles.original: ああ 風が時間とともに 流れる
subtitles.english: Ah, the wind flows along with time.

subtitles.original: 嬉しくって 楽しくって 冒険もいろいろしたね
subtitles.english:
We were happy and having fun,
and we went on all sorts of adventures.

subtitles.original: 二人の秘密の基地の中
subtitles.english: Inside our secret base.

subtitles.original: 君と夏の終わり 将来の夢 大きな希望 忘れない
subtitles.english:
The end of summer with you, dreams of the future,
great hopes—I won't forget them.

subtitles.original: 10年後の8月 また出会えるのを信じて
subtitles.english:
Believing that we'll meet again in August,
ten years from now.

subtitles.original: 君が最後まで心から 「ありがとう」 叫んでいたこと知っていたよ
subtitles.english:
I knew that until the very end, you were shouting
"thank you" from your heart.

subtitles.original: 涙をこらえて 笑顔でさようなら せつないよね
subtitles.english:
Holding back tears and saying goodbye with a smile,
it's painful, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 最高の
subtitles.english: The best

subtitles.original: 思い出を...
subtitles.english: memories...

subtitles.original: ああ 夏休みもあと少しで終わっちゃうから
subtitles.english: Ah, because summer vacation is ending soon.

subtitles.original: ああ 太陽と月 仲良くして
subtitles.english: Ah, let the sun and moon get along well.

subtitles.original: 悲しくって 寂しくって 喧嘩もいろいろしたね
subtitles.english:
We were sad and lonely,
and we had all sorts of fights.

subtitles.original: 二人の秘密の基地の中
subtitles.english: Inside our secret base.

subtitles.original: 君が最後まで心から 「ありがとう」 叫んでいたこと知っていたよ
subtitles.english:
I knew that until the very end, you were shouting
"thank you" from your heart.

subtitles.original: 涙をこらえて 笑顔でさようなら せつないよね
subtitles.english:
Holding back tears and saying goodbye with a smile,
it's painful, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 最高の
subtitles.english: The best

subtitles.original: 思い出を...
subtitles.english: memories...

subtitles.original: 突然の
subtitles.english: The sudden

subtitles.original: 転校で
subtitles.english: transfer...

subtitles.original: どうしようもなく
subtitles.english: There was nothing I could do.

subtitles.original: 手紙書くよ 電話もするよ 忘れないでね 僕のこと
subtitles.english:
I'll write letters, I'll call you,
so don't forget me.

subtitles.original: いつまでも二人の基地の中
subtitles.english: Always inside our base.

subtitles.original: 君と夏の終わり ずっと話して 夕日を見てから星を眺め
subtitles.english:
The end of summer with you, talking forever,
watching the sunset and then the stars.

subtitles.original: 君の頬を流れた涙はずっと忘れない
subtitles.english:
I'll never forget the tears
that ran down your cheeks.

subtitles.original: 君が最後まで大きく手を振ってくれたこと きっと忘れない
subtitles.english:
I'm sure I'll never forget how you waved your hand
broadly until the end.

subtitles.original: だからこうして夢の中でずっと永遠に...
subtitles.english: So like this, in my dreams, forever and ever...

subtitles.original: 君と夏の終わり 将来の夢 大きな希望 忘れない
subtitles.english:
The end of summer with you, dreams of the future,
great hopes—I won't forget them.

subtitles.original: 10年後の8月 また出会えるのを信じて
subtitles.english:
Believing that we'll meet again in August,
ten years from now.

subtitles.original: 君が最後まで心から 「ありがとう」 叫んでいたこと知っていたよ
subtitles.english:
I knew that until the very end, you were shouting
"thank you" from your heart.

subtitles.original: 涙をこらえて 笑顔でさようなら せつないよね
subtitles.english:
Holding back tears and saying goodbye with a smile,
it's painful, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 最高の
subtitles.english: The best

subtitles.original: 思い出を...
subtitles.english: memories...

subtitles.original: 最高の
subtitles.english: The best

subtitles.original: 思い出を...
subtitles.english: memories...
